items.reviewContent: Very very bad experience had with courier service (Leopard), first they miss committed and delayed delivery  for 3 days saying that the machine would deliver today or in the morning or in the second half etc complain launched at LEOPARD (complain #CN FS886407974) but no assistance got from there. On Friday wrong time they sent the delivery when Jumma prayer was being offered secondly delivery man was absolutely illiterate and bad manner guy his number is (0345-3114670, 0347-9566743) who knows nothing about area and saying that he is newly joined,  arguing and complaining about the address whereas address was properly given to DARAZ, when guiding him the location on phone that guy saying that you did not pay me to deliver why should I listen you blab la. Daraz should take strong action against the courier company and charge a penalty.
